humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are metastases in 10 out of 10 assessed lymph nodes in the right axilla (part 10, A). This corresponds to N3 stage according to the AJCC staging system (New Rule 13).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N3 because the pathology report indicates that metastatic carcinoma involves ten lymph nodes (10/10) in the right axilla. There is no mention of extracapsular extension in the non-sentinel lymph nodes, but the presence of metastatic carcinoma in ten lymph nodes is sufficient for an N3 classification. The report also mentions that there are metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes (1/1) but this is not taken into account for N staging as the non-sentinel lymph nodes are also involved.
